scripts.compile-jade: jade src/main/resources/web -o dist/web/tmpl && mv dist/web/tmpl/index.html dist/web
scripts.compile-java: javac -encoding utf-8 -source 7 -target 7 -cp "${VERTX_HOME}/lib/*" src/main/java/ch/webelexis/*.java src/main/java/ch/webelexis/agenda/*.java src/main/java/ch/webelexis/account/*.java src/main/java/ch/webelexis/emr/*.java -d dist
scripts.compile-javatests: javac -encoding utf-8 -source 7 -target 7 -cp "${VERTX_HOME}/lib/*:${JUNIT_HOME}/*" src/test/java/ch/webelexis/tests/*.java src/main/java/ch/webelexis/account/*.java src/main/java/ch/webelexis/*.java src/main/java/ch/webelexis/agenda/*.java src/main/java/ch/webelexis/emr/*.java -d dist
scripts.build-client: npm run create-dirs && npm run compile-jade && npm run compile-js
scripts.preverticle: npm run compile-java && cp cfglocal.json dist && cp src/main/resources/config_sample.json dist/config_defaults.json
scripts.verticle: cd dist && vertx run ch.webelexis.CoreVerticle -conf cfglocal.json
scripts.prebuild-module: npm run clean && vertx uninstall ch-webelexis~${npm_package_name}~${npm_package_version} && npm run build-client && npm run preverticle && cp src/main/resources/mod.json dist
scripts.build-jar: npm run build-module && cd .. && vertx fatjar ch.webelexis~${npm_package_name}~${npm_package_version}
scripts.watch: npm run test && parallelshell 'npm run watch-jade' 'npm run watch-js'
scripts.start: npm run build-client && npm run verticle
scripts.test-karma: npm run clean && npm run build-client && karma start karma_cfg.js &
scripts.test-client: npm run clean && npm run build-client && karma start karma_cfg.js --single-run
scripts.test-all: npm run test-client && npm run preverticle && npm run compile-javatests && java -cp ${VERTX_HOME}/lib/*:${JUNIT_HOME}/*:dist org.junit.runner.JUnitCore ch.webelexis.tests.WebelexisTestSuite
